Conjuration 7

Contact Yama-no-kami

LA Jomon

Summon Commander:#2097 Yama-no-kami
Source Terrain : Mountains, Border Mountains
The Shugenja contacts and strikes a bargain with a Yama-no-kami, a mountain god and protector of the wild. They are powerful spirits as cold as the peaks they rule. Only rarely do they concern themselves with lesser beings. They command natural phenomena, weather and beasts in their realms, and might help or destroy the occasional wanderer. Yama-no-kami very rarely leave their lofty abodes and would lose much of their powers if they did.
